item.title: “U.S. District Judge Thomas Parker handed down his ruling Friday, arguing the law is too vague and overly broad, also saying it encouraged discriminatory enforcement.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
A federal judge has ruled that Tennessee’s drag ban law is unconstitutional as it violates the First Amendment’s right to speech and freedom of expression.
The law was intended to ban drag shows in public or where children could see them.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: NCT's Taeyong drops the music video teaser to his solo debut ‘샤랄라 (SHALALA).’ Out Monday, June 5th.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: NCT Dream teases their comeback with ‘Broken Melodies.’ Out this month.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Cruel Summer’ by Taylor Swift earns its biggest streaming day on Global Spotify since its release in 2019, with over 2.62 million streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
‘Popular’ by The Weeknd with Playboi Carti ft. Madonna debuts at #10 on Global Spotify with 3.7 million streams.
It also debuts at #3 on US Spotify with 1.2 million streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
Stray Kids charts 7 songs off their new album ‘★★★★★ (5-STAR)’ on Global Spotify.
#42. S-Class — 2.23M #83. TOPLINE — 1.73M #120. Hall of Fame — 1.47M #122. Super Bowl — 1.46M #133. ITEM — 1.42M #163. DLC — 1.3M #177. GET LIT — 1.24M
